item.title: Rep. Grijalva says ICE agents pepper sprayed her at Tucson restaurant raid
item.description: ICE agents deployed both tear gas and pepper balls at protesters, video obtained by The Post shows.

item.title: Trump wants to be known as a peacemaker while frequently threatening war
item.description: The president talks frequently of his desire for more peace. He also likes talking like a warmonger.
